original_text: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
korean_text: 사람이 내 안에 거하지 아니하면 가지처럼 밖에 버려져 마르나니 사람들이 그것을 모아다가 불에 던져 사르느니라

sentences.original_text: If a man abide not in me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 사람이 내 안에 머물지 않으면

sentences.original_text: he is cast forth as a branch
and cast them into the fire
